channel.title: 金融时报

item.title: 早上好，纽约。当你还在熟睡时，我们读得最多的新闻是关于俄罗斯国有天然气垄断企业俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）正努力应对对欧洲天然气销售的崩溃。
item.description: Good morning, New York. While you were sleeping, our most read story was on Russia’s state-run gas monopoly Gazprom grappling with a collapse in sales to Europe on.ft.com/3SHr4EJ

item.title: 巴克莱银行宣布了一项在未来三年内向股东返还 100 亿英镑并控制成本的计划，该银行正试图重振萎靡不振的股价。
item.description: Barclays has announced a plan to return £10bn to shareholders over the next three years and rein in costs as the bank attempts to revive its languishing share price on.ft.com/3T61Z7U

item.title:
2023 年最后一个季度，以色列经济萎缩近 20%。
由于以色列将资源投入到加沙战争中，经济急剧下降的幅度远远超过了分析师的预测。
item.description:
Israel’s economy shrank almost 20% in the final quarter of 2023. 

The sharp drop was far steeper than analysts had forecast as the country poured resources into the war in Gaza

ft.com/content/763bb384-a974…

item.title: 欧洲不负众望，摆脱了对俄罗斯天然气的依赖，而国营天然气垄断企业则成为这场战争中最大的受害企业之一
item.description: Europe has defied expectations by breaking its addiction to Russian gas, and the state-run gas monopoly has become one of the war’s biggest corporate casualties ft.com/content/e1b65044-1a97…
